title: 820-3462 No Caps Lock light
message: The Caps Lock light on this board doesn't work. Caps lock works but no light. I have tried different keyboards and still the same.

title: 820-3462 No Caps Lock light
message:
Liquid damage/corrosion, missing components?
-look at caps lock led drive circuit(u5830 q5736 q5738 and q5734)
-check continuity between pin 40 U5701 and pins 5&2 of U5730

title: 820-3462 No Caps Lock light
message: Yes water damaged. My initial problem with the board was missing One wire 3,42V, but got that sorted. This board doesn't have any components of the LED drive circuit. I have already tried to replace U5701.

title: 820-3462 No Caps Lock light
message: Really who cares about the cap lock LED? It is simply driven from U5701, so either bad trace or resistor R5714 or bad connector.

title: 820-3462 No Caps Lock light
message: I do :), Okey, thank you, I'll try the connector when I get back from my summer holiday. R5714 is fine.

title: 820-3462 No Caps Lock light
message: Juts leave it and avoid any further complications.
